sentence.Network_en: She had said she would look at pictures all throught the nooning.
sentence.Network_cn: 她说过在中午休息时间她要去看电影.

sentence.Network_en: I use off hours, for instance net of nooning time, late before last.
sentence.Network_cn: 我利用业余时间, 比如中午休息时间 、 晚上上网.
